# This is Stephanie's awesome website

You can add text

* and lists

You can *FORMAT* and **bold**


How to add links

This is a [link](https://www.google.com/) to search engine.


You can also still use R

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

plot_df =
  tibble(
    x = runif(100),
    y = 1 + 2 * x + rnorm(100)
  )

plot_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()

```
